title: AKDMKS : Akademiks clothing : 003 : "Trinidad Script"
content:
Akademiks is an NYC-based clothing company, established in 1999. I am posting a series of fonts used by Akademiks. Please help me ID the fonts.

“Trinidad Script”

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110509072754im_/http:/typophile.com/files/aka-trinidad-17701_6170.jpg)

I think this might be the same face as "Pink & Blue Script"
author: dirtcastle

comments.content:
I think this is OptiSport Script (a.k.a. Spoleto, Aktuelle, etc.)

- Mike Yanega
